career.name: MachaCo.store
career.title: Tech Lead (Co-Founder)
description: Led technology strategy and execution for an emerging e-commerce brand, driving platform scalability and business alignment.
Architected and deployed a Next.js-based platform with integrated analytics to track KPIs and guide data-driven decisions.
Contributed to product R&D and strategic planning, ensuring technical solutions supported growth and market positioning.

career.name: Aditya Birla Grasim (TRADC)
career.title: Product Development Intern
description: Designed and prototyped a sustainable performance sweatshirt using SeaCell fiber, managing the full product lifecycle from fiber selection to garment construction with a focus on material innovation, user comfort, and process optimization.
Collaborated cross-functionally with textile scientists, process engineers, and design leads to align performance, aesthetics, and manufacturability.
Delivered a structured technical dossier and product narrativeâ€”bridging R&D insights with consumer-facing use cases and sustainable market potential.
